snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia hit back at political opponents who mocked his latest stunt: flying a motorized glider to help lead endangered cranes from Siberia south.
abstract: President Vladimir V Putin of Russia hits back at political opponents who mocked his latest stunt of flying a motorized glider to help lead endangered cranes from Siberia; uses the criticism at a news conference as a springboard to attack his critics and show his strong leadership position and the importance of following his lead.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and STEVEN LEE MYERS

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia hit back at political opponents who mocked his latest stunt: flying a motorized glider to help lead endangered cranes from Siberia south.

headline.main: For Putin, a Flight of Fancy at a Summit Meeting’s Close
headline.print_headline: For Putin, a Flight of Fancy at a Summit Meeting’s Close
